entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is holding the threat of no Gryffindor Quidditch team over Harry's head.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends and a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends and a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who assigns essays to students.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's godfather and a wizard who is due in the fire later.

relationships.description: Umbridge is holding the threat of no Gryffindor Quidditch team over Harry's head.
Hermione tries to cheer up Harry by suggesting he has time to do Snape's essay.
Ron stares incredulously at Hermione, observing her reaction to the situation.
Snape assigns Harry an essay to do.
Sirius is due in the fire later, which Harry knows but can't help glancing at.
